message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $9000 for it.
I understand that $15000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $12500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $12500 is still a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $10500 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting closer to a deal. I can see you're willing to pay a bit more than $10000, so I'm willing to meet you at $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $11000. I'd be willing to pay $10750 for the product.
I'm not willing to go below $11500, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $11000 and $10750. I can offer it to you for $11375. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $11375 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $11000 for the product.
I'm starting to feel like we're really close to a deal. I'm willing to make one last concession. I can offer it to you for $11250. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $11250 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $10500 for the product.
